description: The perfect Japanese emoticons for those times when love hurts. Whether you just broke up with your beloved, you find yourself alone on valentines day, or if you just love someone so much that it hurts, then one of these emoticons might be perfect for our self expression. They are either cutting ties with lovers, trying to reach for love, or they are generally upset. The poor guys..  ( ＾◡＾)っ✂❤ (∿°○°)∿ ︵ ǝʌol ♡╰(*ﾟxﾟ*)╯♡ ( ﾟ∀ﾟ)ﾉ【LOVE】 ( ﾟ∀ﾟ)ﾉ　　　　　～【LOVE】 Σ(;ﾟ∀ﾟ)ﾉ　　　　　　　　　　　　三【LOVE:;*.’:|
title: Love Hurts
